QuestData.Title: We Need Weapons
QuestData.Description: So many of the rebels want to help in the coming battle. Our people have the will, they lack only the means.$b$bThey need weapons.$b$bFrom what Khadgar has told me, the fortress of Black Rook has plenty of munitions we could use.$b$bTravel to the fortress and place these beacons on some weapon caches there. Once placed, I can teleport them back.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover $1oa Weapon Caches at Black Rook Hold in Val'sharah.
QuestData.RewardText: These weapons should prove quite useful in the coming conflict. Well done, hero.
